recommendations: Not appearing for "pizza near me", "pizza", "best pizza Pittsburgh", "pizza delivery near me", "pizza Pittsburgh Pennsylvania", "top pizza Pittsburgh", "pizza restaurant near me", "pizza food Pittsburgh" - optimize Google My Business profile with these keywords

businessProfile.name: Pizza Perfectta
businessProfile.address: 258 S Highland Ave, Pittsburgh, PA 15206, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 258 S Highland Ave, Pittsburgh, PA 15206, USA

reviews.text:
Friendly and delicious local pizza. Our favorite is the hot pepperoni pizza! Their hoagies are also amazing. This is the most slept on pizza in Pittsburgh! A must try

I love that the employees they‚Äôre trying to learn folks names. Make sure you sign up for their rewards program and text offers because their discounts are amazing!

"Absolutely delicious every time! üí£üí£ My family are regulars ‚Äî whether it's delivery or pickup, we always go for the XL sausage pizza, garlic parmesan wings, and Italian + Fish hoagies. Our go-to favorites and great comfort foods. IT NEVER DISAPPOINT!"

It's customers service, Frank, John, and Jim are always extremely pleasant and friendly! Top notch service every time! The atmosphere is like Cheers "Everybody know your name"

I really wanted to love Pizza Perfecta ‚Äî the menu has great variety, pricing is reasonable for the portion sizes, and it seemed like a solid choice. Unfortunately, my experience left a lot to be desired.

I ordered the Penne Alla Vodka with an addition of alfredo sauce, but somehow ended up with chicken alfredo‚Ä¶ which is not even remotely the same dish. Not the same sauce, not the same flavor, not even the same type of pasta... genuinely baffling error. To make things more frustrating, the included side salad and bread were both missing ‚Äî although they did manage to send the dressing cups.

Really disappointed. I was looking forward to this meal, but it ended up being a letdown in both accuracy and follow-through. Would love to try this place again when they have more attention to detail.
Pizza was great! This was my second time ordering. Very good vegan options. Will continue buying pizza here :)

Single slice available! And you can also choose to have original (tomato sauce +cheese) one or add extra toppings on it! When you add extra toppings, they would help you put as much topping as they could, heat, and cut them. I love this store because people there are friendly and their pizza is really delicious even for the crust part. Also, they have a cool handmade pizza clock! Definitely a good place to visit when you want to have pizza!

editorial_summary.overview: Compact counter-serve pizza joint offering specialty pies, pastas, sandwiches, wings & calzones.

issues: Mobile performance data unavailable - API configuration required
recommendations: Configure Google PageSpeed Insights API for mobile analysis
Test website on mobile devices manually

recentReviews.author: RC
recentReviews.text:
"Absolutely delicious every time! üí£üí£ My family are regulars ‚Äî whether it's delivery or pickup, we always go for the XL sausage pizza, garlic parmesan wings, and Italian + Fish hoagies. Our go-to favorites and great comfort foods. IT NEVER DISAPPOINT!"

It's customers service, Frank, John, and Jim are always extremely pleasant and friendly! Top notch service every time! The atmosphere is like Cheers "Everybody know your name"

recentReviews.author: Brittany Gunsallus
recentReviews.text:
I really wanted to love Pizza Perfecta ‚Äî the menu has great variety, pricing is reasonable for the portion sizes, and it seemed like a solid choice. Unfortunately, my experience left a lot to be desired.

I ordered the Penne Alla Vodka with an addition of alfredo sauce, but somehow ended up with chicken alfredo‚Ä¶ which is not even remotely the same dish. Not the same sauce, not the same flavor, not even the same type of pasta... genuinely baffling error. To make things more frustrating, the included side salad and bread were both missing ‚Äî although they did manage to send the dressing cups.

Really disappointed. I was looking forward to this meal, but it ended up being a letdown in both accuracy and follow-through. Would love to try this place again when they have more attention to detail.

recentReviews.author: Enrique Talavera
recentReviews.text: Pizza was great! This was my second time ordering. Very good vegan options. Will continue buying pizza here :)

recentReviews.author: Thuan Phung
recentReviews.text:
Friendly and delicious local pizza. Our favorite is the hot pepperoni pizza! Their hoagies are also amazing. This is the most slept on pizza in Pittsburgh! A must try

I love that the employees they‚Äôre trying to learn folks names. Make sure you sign up for their rewards program and text offers because their discounts are amazing!

recentReviews.author: WEN-YU CHEN
recentReviews.text: Single slice available! And you can also choose to have original (tomato sauce +cheese) one or add extra toppings on it! When you add extra toppings, they would help you put as much topping as they could, heat, and cut them. I love this store because people there are friendly and their pizza is really delicious even for the crust part. Also, they have a cool handmade pizza clock! Definitely a good place to visit when you want to have pizza!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.2/5 rating from 5 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers appreciate the personalized service where employees try to learn their names, creating a welcoming atmosphere reminiscent of "Cheers." - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant offers a rewards program and text offers with amazing discounts, which customers love. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this

The pizza place is praised for its delicious and varied menu options, including vegan choices and customizable single slices with generous toppings. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Order inaccuracies (wrong dish delivered) - review management can address this concern
Missing items in orders (side salad and bread) - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative experience leading to disappointment - social media marketing can improve this area

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
